pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Package for Aqua Culture // Solves the individual bioenergetic balance for different aquaculture sea fish (Sea Bream and Sea Bass; Brigolin et al., 2014 doi:10.3354/aei00093) and shellfish (Mussel and Clam; Brigolin et al., 2009 doi:10.1016/j.ecss.2009.01.029; Solidoro et al., 2000 doi:10.3354/meps199137). Allows for spatialized model runs and population simulations.
